ext_name.description: Extension name shown in the Chrome Web Store and toolbar. Keep brand as-is.

ext_description.message: Safer send, vim-like scroll, model toggles, temporary chats, and clean UI for NotebookLM.
ext_description.description: Short summary of what the extension does.

action_title.description: Tooltip/title for the browser action and options page.

button_reset.description: Button label to reset settings to defaults.

button_resetting.description: Shown on the reset button while reset is in progress.

section_features.description: Heading label for the features toggle section.

section_shortcuts.description: Heading label for the shortcuts section.

status_loading_settings.description: Status text shown while settings are being loaded.

popup_footer_review_prompt.message: Even a short comment would truly make me happy
popup_footer_review_prompt.description: Message shown above the footer links encouraging reviews.

status_enable_shortcuts.description: Empty state message shown when no shortcuts are available because toggles are off.

placeholder_press_keys.description: Placeholder text in the shortcut input field.

error_load_settings.message: Failed to load settings. Please reload the page.
error_load_settings.description: Error message shown when settings could not be loaded from storage.

error_save_settings.message: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
error_save_settings.description: Error message shown when settings could not be saved.

error_shortcut_conflict.description: Shown when a shortcut conflicts with an existing assignment. $1 is the pressed keys, $2 is the existing action label.

error_shortcut_requires_modifier.message: "$1" must be combined with a modifier key.
error_shortcut_requires_modifier.description: Shown when a disallowed single key is used without modifiers.

error_shortcut_forbidden_key.message: "$1" cannot be used as a shortcut.
error_shortcut_forbidden_key.description: Shown when a key is not allowed at all.

info_shortcut_updated.description: Shown after a shortcut is successfully updated. $1 is the action label, $2 is the new keys.

info_reset_success.description: Confirmation message shown after settings are reset.

toggle_vimScroll.description: Feature toggle label for Vim-style scrolling.

toggle_wideScreen.description: Feature toggle label for wide screen layout controls.

toggle_safeSend.description: Feature toggle label for sending messages with Cmd/Ctrl + Enter.

toggle_otherShortcuts.description: Feature toggle label for additional shortcuts.

shortcut_scrollHalfUp.description: Shortcut label: scroll half page up.

shortcut_scrollHalfDown.description: Shortcut label: scroll half page down.

shortcut_addSources.description: Shortcut label: open add sources dialog.

shortcut_toggleRightSidebar.message: Toggle Right Side Bar / Move Right Tab
shortcut_toggleRightSidebar.description: Shortcut label for right sidebar or moving to right tab.

shortcut_toggleLeftSidebar.message: Toggle Left Side Bar / Move Left Tab
shortcut_toggleLeftSidebar.description: Shortcut label for left sidebar or moving to left tab.

modal_title_shortcuts.description: Title for the shortcuts modal dialog.

modal_section_common.description: Section title for shortcuts available on all layouts.

modal_section_large.description: Section title for shortcuts on large screens.

modal_section_small.description: Section title for shortcuts on small screens.

modal_column_action.description: Column header label for the action name.

modal_column_shortcut.description: Column header label for the shortcut keys.

modal_settings_row_label.description: Row label that links to the extension settings.

modal_settings_row_link.description: Link text to open the extension settings.

modal_action_keyboard_shortcuts.description: Row label describing the shortcut help action.

modal_action_toggle_right_sidebar.description: Row label for toggling the right sidebar.

modal_action_toggle_left_sidebar.description: Row label for toggling the left sidebar.

modal_action_move_right_tab.description: Row label for moving to the right tab (small screens).

modal_action_move_left_tab.description: Row label for moving to the left tab (small screens).

modal_action_delete_chat_history.description: Row label for deleting chat history.

app_name_full.description: Extension name shown in the Chrome Web Store and toolbar. Keep brand as-is.

app_name_short.description: Short app name shown where space is limited.

app_description.message: Safer send, vim-like scroll, model toggles, temporary chats, and clean UI for NotebookLM.
app_description.description: Short summary of what the extension does.
